allow: Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_profiles WHERE active = true;")
Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "DELETE FROM user_profiles;")
Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "DELETE FROM venues CASCADE;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "SELECT ''user_profiles'' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM user_profiles UNION ALL SELECT ''venues'', COUNT(*) FROM venues UNION ALL SELECT ''venue_areas'', COUNT(*) FROM venue_areas UNION ALL SELECT ''stock_sessions'', COUNT(*) FROM stock_sessions;")
